alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 09 at 3:59PM EDT until September 09 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida... North central Franklin County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 430 PM EDT. * At 359 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 15 miles northwest of Carrabelle, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... East Camp, Poplar Camp, Morgan Place and Owens Bridge. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
